appearances.title: NBC Bay Area News Special : KNTV : January 10, 2026 6:30pm-7:00pm PST
appearances.snippet: kevin mullin: absolutely. bigad: congressman kevin mullin represents parts of california's silicon valley. kevin: the technology is moving so rapidly that we are playing catch up. but you also don't want to put a set of rules in place that will very quickly be outdated by the advance of technology. bigad: do you worry what might happen in the absence of federal regulation? kevin: absolutely, i worry. bigad: real concerns over a problem that is only becoming more real. male: i forgot my login information. would you mind sharing it? bigad: it's scary how quickly it can do it. bigad: sarah barrington was able to clone my voice in less than 30 seconds. sarah: and imagine now that we pipe that through a phone. so you've got background noise coming in, you've got a low quality call. it's even harder to tell if this is your identity or not. bigad: and now she warns just about anyone can do it with a few bucks and an internet connection. bigad shaban, "nbc bay area" news, we investigate. candice: okay, there is no ai
